name: aRGB
description:
A minimalist game of precision to match the provided color closely enough!

Plans (no schedule, no guarantee):

  • Fix the difficulty curve.
  • Add sound. Plus, perhaps, this could make the game accessible to colorblind people?
  • Polish (better textures, icon, better background, etc).
  • Leniency mechanics, such as allowing minor misses from time to time.
